root: ^It seems figurines depict muses. Ksenia, do you know anything about muses?

c-0: ^It seems figurines depict muses. Ksenia, do you know anything about muses?
^This is Clio, Urania and Melpomene, but I forgot which one is responsible for what. Clio muse of the theater… or history… I do not remember.
^With a scroll – Clio, with a mask – Melpomene!
